articles.title: Alpha-gal syndrome from tick bite changed my life beyond meat allergy - Business Insider
articles.description: A lone star tick bite gave me Alpha-gal syndrome, commonly known for causing a meat allergy. But the disease has changed my life more than that.
articles.content:
This as-told-to essay is based on a conversation with Lon Wilhelms, about her experience living with Alpha-gal syndrome. It has been edited for length and clarity.
